name: Automaton Lung
description:
Make use of your special abilities to skate, shoot, and fly through over 40 unique locations, all rendered in beautiful stereoscopic 3D. In a strange land with almost no information you must be resourceful and clever.
Question everything you see and trust nothing you hear.

Each footstep taken, every mile flown, and all doorways entered reveal more to discover in Automaton Lung.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.

Game is compatible with the Nintendo 3DS family of systems. When played on New Nintendo 3DS XL, additional features may be available. Visit Nintendo.com for more details.
